availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Robert T. Bell (Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier (War of 1812))

body.p: Hartford, Ohio County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ann Monroe Bell. Married to Rachel E. Baird Bell in Ohio County on September 21, 1871.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, County, City/District, p. 587.
War of 1812 Pension Application Files Index, 1812-1815 NARA Microfilm Publication M313, Roll 7. Records of the Department of Veterans Affairs, Record Group Number 15. (Accessed via ancestry.com).
